membership.providers: <add name="MySqlMembershipProvider" type="MySql.Web.Security.MySQLMembershipProvider" connectionStringName="LocalMySqlServer" enablePasswordRetrieval="true" enablePasswordReset="false" requiresQuestionAndAnswer="true" requiresUniqueEmail="false" passwordFormat="Encrypted" maxInvalidPasswordAttempts="3" passwordAttemptWindow="20" minRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters="1" minRequiredPasswordLength="11" passwordStrengthRegularExpression="@\"(?=.{6,})(?=(.*\d){1,})(?=(.*\W){1,})" applicationName="MyApplication" />
